one_reviews_text: This Oculus version is too short. One level only? More like demo.. Abandoned game.. :-/
Finally the Tron game I have been looking for only drawback no disk .. just a gun.. but fun so far

This is a great early access pickup and already a fantastic robot zapper with awesome music and graphics that really take to supersampling well.  The Dev is inspired and his future content updates are going to make it even better, can't wait to see what's in store!

New update is now Live! 
PLEASE NOTE!
This new update contains the Tutorial & 1 level at the moment, more levels from the previous build are currently being upgraded & will be added soon!
If you wish to access the previous build with all 5 levels please contact me at uzigames2016(AT)gmail.com so I can add you to access!
Please follow @uzigames2016.com on twitter for current development updates.
I like music and enemy design.  I'm looking forward to stepping back into this after the next update.

review_title: amazing game! a really fun FPS
one_reviews_text: and one of my favorites from today. Atmosphere and inmmersion are great. Hope you keep working on it.
review_feedback: Thanks Fguillotine! A new content update will be released this month which includes a new level, new weapon attack, new boss and graphical/sound fx updates to existing levels.

one_reviews_text: Great tunes, neon lit scenery, solid fps action with a sweet control system. Meesa happy fish!
review_feedback: Thank you! Please look forward to a big content update next week which includes a new deflecting Laser Disc shield and a new boss!

one_reviews_text: It's a full movement FPS which is something that I've wanted to see a lot more of, but you move by using the trigger as a gas pedal and the rotate the controller to strafe. I think that you're supposed to be able to smooth turn based on my reading of the instructions but if so it doesn't work. Instead I have to turn in incremements with the left analogue stick which is always disorienting for me or turn with my body which gets me tangled up pretty quickly when trying to fight a bunch of enemies. I would much rather that locomotion just used the analogue sticks the way we have all become accustomed to. Aside from that I found the graphical style made it difficult to see where I was going and where the enemies were. Also, my bullets felt really underpowered. I would rather fifty enemies that die in one or two shots than five enemies that take ten or more shots.
review_feedback:
Hi theregoes2, thanks for the feedback! New control options are now available including full joystick control, snap rotation and smooth rotation. 
New bots, graphical updates, a new weapon and 2 more levels have now been added.
Gun power & enemy damage tweaks have also been updated which should address those issues.
Hope you like the new updates and I welcome any further feedback you may have.

one_reviews_text:
Loving the updates to this game, the new level & weapon is awesome! Can't wait for more. 
Finally! A fully locomotive fast paced shooter for peeps with good VR legs. This game has a great cyberspace visual style & blood pumping tunes! It even has a platformy type section (don't get squished). Highly recommended!
review_feedback: Thank you! There is a lot more to come!
